attributes.action: Make gluten free product similar price as original
attributes.additional_details: I want you to fo this as a ceoliac myself see that the price is more expensive but I fall ill if I eat the gluten products
attributes.background: Change the price of gluten free products to original to help people with ceoliac disease in the cost of living crisis

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about prices for food products, including gluten-free products, are a matter for food manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Voucher scheme for those with Coeliacs Disease for gluten-free food: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620602
